artCsv.Name: Artisan's Tools (Custom)
artCsv.Hint: Comma-separated list of custom Artisan's Tools. Example: Glass Cutter's Kit, Bone Carver's Kit

gameCsv.Name: Gaming Sets (Custom)
gameCsv.Hint: Comma-separated list of custom Gaming Sets. Example: Tile Set, Shell Game

musicCsv.Name: Musical Instruments (Custom)
musicCsv.Hint: Comma-separated list of custom Musical Instruments. Example: Handpan, War Pipes

vehicleCsv.Name: Vehicles (Custom)
vehicleCsv.Hint: Comma-separated list of custom Vehicle proficiencies. Example: Sand Skiff, Ice Sled

otherCsv.Name: Other Tools (Custom)
otherCsv.Hint: Comma-separated list of custom tools that do not fit other categories. Example: Navigator's Lenses, Rune Etcher
